title: Miso Soup
ingredients: 2  green onions, sliced diagonally into 1/2 inch pieces
method: Step 2: Combine water and dashi granules in a medium saucepan over medium-high heat; bring to a boil.
Step 3: Reduce heat to medium and whisk in miso paste.
Step 5: Separate the layers of green onions, and add them to the soup. Simmer gently for 2 to 3 minutes before serving.
